description: Simulates the effect of the mobile device access rules for the given attributes of a sample access event. Use this method to test the effects of the current set of mobile device access rules for the WorkMail organization for a particular user's attributes.

parameters.name: OrganizationId
parameters.description: The WorkMail organization to simulate the access effect for.

nested_items.name: Effect
nested_items.description: The effect of the simulated access, ALLOW or DENY, after evaluating mobile device access rules in the WorkMail organization for the simulated user parameters.

nested_items.name: MatchedRules
nested_items.description: A list of the rules which matched the simulated user input and produced the effect.

nested_items.name: MobileDeviceAccessRuleId
nested_items.description: Identifier of the rule that a simulated user matches.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Name of a rule that a simulated user matches.
